name: Counterfeit Catcher
description:
Do you have what it takes to root out counterfeit cash? Find out by playing Counterfeit Catcher, the brand new, top-of-the-line,  ultimate counterfeit cash catching simulator.

- Utilize 3 different tools to sniff out mistakes on bills

- 5 "days" to play through, with each one slightly harder than the last

- And of course, your trusty handbook!

Programming & Unity Work done by Lauren "thorn" Henry

Art done by Addison "addietood" Bugdonovitch

Audio sourced by Gray "windshapes" Mankin

All audio sourced from freesound.org

This game is a submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

Theme: "It Is Not Real"
